title: Trump's Covid-19 Export Ban Prompts Backlash Around the World - Financial Post
description: (Bloomberg) — A move by President Donald Trump to restrict exports of masks and other protective equipment needed to fight the Covid-19 pandemic is drawing a backlash from around the world ev…
content: (Bloomberg) — A move by President Donald Trump to restrict exports of masks and other protective equipment needed to fight the Covid-19 pandemic is drawing a backlash from around the world even as a senior aide to the president said Monday the U.S. was “locke… [+7709 chars]
